descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...patterns with different-colored single squares
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...same as input
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...draw diagonal lines of the same color extending from all four corners the single squares. When your lines reach another color block, continue the line but switch to the color of the single-squares corresponding to that color block.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a grid filled with colors and one or more single squares of color.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...remains the same.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to... continue the single color squares on the diagonal both direction but ONLY within the color around it, stop when you get to an edge.
